app.title: Localizr
app.teaser: Skip the manual work! Localizr automates i18n translations with AI, keeping your app multilingual and up to date. Faster, smarter, and hassle-free!

unauthorized.title: Oops
unauthorized.message: You seem to have landed on a page that you are not authorized to view. You may need to login, or register in case you don't have an account.

authresult.title: Hold on
authresult.message: We're aligning the sun and the moon to make sure you are who you say you are.

logoffresult.title: Logging off
logoffresult.message: Releasing cosmic tension to make sure all tokens are lost in space... You're safe now
